label: 赤蝦夷風説考
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
見出し読み: あかえぞふうせつこう
説明文: Written by Kudō Heisuke, a medical pracitioner from Sendai.  Kudō's argument in favor of commercial exchange with Russia was so convincing that the senior councilor dispatched a team to Hokkaido in 1785 to investigate the possibilities of opening trade relations (p. 465). [工藤平助、仙台、北海道]
